Class Switch

java.lang.Object
  edu.luc.cs.trull.EmptyComponent
      edu.luc.cs.trull.TerminatingComponent
          edu.luc.cs.trull.AbstractComponent
              edu.luc.cs.trull.AbstractCombinator
                  edu.luc.cs.trull.Switch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Combinator, Component, java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, PropertyChangeSource, SchedulerAware, Startable, Suspendable, Terminating
Direct Known Subclasses:
If
public class Switch
extends AbstractCombinator

A data-driven selection mechanism that immediately evaluates its valuator (criterium) and chooses the corresponding branch. The resulting component terminates when the chosen branch terminates.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class Switch.LocalListener
          A dedicated listener that forwards the event to all external listeners.
protected  class Switch.SwitchTerminationListener
          A component that terminates as soon as the chosen branch component terminates.
